name: A Bear, a Beard, and a lot of Chainsaws
name_original: A Bear, a Beard, and a lot of Chainsaws
description:
* Game made for LudumDare37 - Theme : "One Room" *

You are an old BeardedBear that lives in the woods, you built your tiny house and you are finally relaxing.

But now the forest rangers have found you and they want to destroy everything!

Kill them all with your Chainsaw-gun, but be sure to not demolish the house yourself !

----------------------------------------------

Controls:

- WASD to move
- SPACE to do a dodgeroll
- Left Click to shoot chainsaws
- F11 toggle fullscreen
- BACKSPACE to restart

----------------------------------------------

Goal:

- Survive 5 waves of rangers
- The score is represented by the not destroyed things, so the max score possible is the starting one ( 0 ) then everything you destroy will be subtracted to your score!

----------------------------------------------

Other Stuff:

- Game made by Stefano "Elkiwy" Bertoli
- Created with GameMakerStudio2
- Music created with Wolframtones (I know, I know.. It sucks, but is better than nothing)
- SFX with BFXR and freesound.org
- Total work time in GameMaker 18 hours and 32 minutes

----------------------------------------------

POST LD37:

I uploaded a build and source of post ludumdare for the GameMaker2 Game Jam with minor changes and better outdoor tiles.

----------------------------------------------

If you like this game you will surely love the BeardedBear main project !
Feel free to check it out at www.BeardedBearTheGame.com and also follow me on Twitter www.twitter.com/ElkiwyDev !
